C1057

Log in for pricing

The AUXO Cira was designed around your needs and made to be enjoyed. It’s an ultra-precise, temperature-controlled vaporizer for concentrates that will leave you wondering what you ever did without it.

Features Overview

  • Temperature range from 450–1000℉
  • Precise temperature control
  • Easy-to-read OLED display
  • 20-second heat-up time
  • Dual 2200mAh batteries
  • Extended heating mode

 

Full Product Specs & Features:

  • Dimensions: 129.8(H) × 76.2 (W) × 59.5 (D) mm (Cira Device and Charging Base only)
  • Weight: 340g (Cira Device and Charging Base only)
  • Screen: OLED Screen

  • Glass Piece: Borosilicate Glass
  • Heating Chamber: Titanium/Quartz
  • Battery Housing: Aluminum Alloy
  • Charging Base: Zinc Alloy

  • Compatible With: Concentrates
  • Heat-Up Time: 20-Second
  • Temperature Range: 450 – 1000 ℉

  • Battery Life: 30-Session Use
  • Battery Type: High Quality Lithium Battery
  • Charging Time: 150 Minutes
  • Capacity: 2200mAh/7.4v

 

The Cira was made to be enjoyed. Its precise temperature control, long-lasting battery life, and thoughtful design make it the ultimate e-rig. It does the work so you can create more joyful moments.

Precise Temperature Control – Powered by AUXO innovative Heating Wire Technology*, Cira delivers unrivaled heating uniformity for more balanced, consistent and controlled sessions. No need to choose between any heat settings. Set the temperature with more precision and start customizing your experience. (*Pat. Pending)

Extended Heating Mode – Cira’s extended heating mode feature enables you to keep the heat with a 15-second, mid-cycle extension. This function comes in handy when you want a temperature boost, or when you’re looking to share with friends. You can add as many 15s extensions as you’d like by simply double clicking the + button within 10s of the heating countdown.

Long-lasting Battery – Forgot the charger? No problem! Cira comes with dual powerful 2200mAh batteries that support more than 30 sessions when fully charged. This gives you more peace of mind when you’re out and about.

Designed Around Your Needs – Through thoughtful design, the Cira delivers. Its comfort grip and distinctive anti-scalding wave design using heat-resistant materials and user-friendly features provide the safest and most enjoyable vaporizer experience. The OLED monitor displays temperature and battery life so that you know exactly what’s going on with your Cira at a quick glance.

Mooselabs MouthPeace Filter Roll – 10PC

AS02

Log in for pricing

Keep your MouthPeace hitting fresh with these official replacement filters from Mooselabs! They remove the bad so you can feel better inhaling the good.

  • Triple-Layer Design
  • Activated Carbon Filtration
  • Biodegradable
  • Made from Recycled Materials
  • Filters Toxins
  • Enhances Taste
  • No-Touch Filter Eject
  • For Use with the Mooselabs MouthPeace

Did you know? Hemp smoke can deposit tar deep into the lungs because of how it’s inhaled.

After 16 months of R&D, the team at Mooselabs has created thir MouthPeace and MouthPeace Filters to address this problem. Made from biodegradable and recycled materials, the triple-layer activated carbon filters will sanitize smoke/vapor and enhance flavors by removing resins, toxins, and tar; all without blocking your intake or reducing airflow.

Using the no-touch design, eject the Filter by pushing it up and out with your thumb from the side of the MouthPeace. Replace as needed for optimal performance. 

See and feel the difference with the MouthPeace personal filter from Mooselabs!

XVape

Xvape-Vista Mini 2

CV1069BK

Log in for pricing

The XVape Vista Mini 2 is a portable, electronic dab rig with water filtration. The ergonomic flared mouthpiece makes long sessions a dream, while being able to easily remove the glass bubbler has clean freaks rejoicing. As always, the bubbler is made from handblown, borosilicate glass for added security.

Small enough to be discreet on your desk, or to take with you on the go thanks to its shock resistant, smell proof case, this lightweight vaporizer is the perfect addition to your dabbing collection. Unlike a lot of other devices which have you waiting forever for heat up time, the Vista Mini 2 reaches its set temperature in only 10 seconds. You get roughly 60 dabs between charges, giving you one more reason to make it your top choice for portability.

Whether you’re new to vaping extracts or consider yourself a connoisseur you’ll be pleased with the function and design of the Vista Mini 2. The solid construction and cutting edge technology blends seamlessly to create the ideal follow-up to the original Vista Mini. Arizer

Arizer V-Tower Desktop

CV1100

Log in for pricing

V-Tower

Hailing from Canada, Arizer set out to make a vaporizer comparable to other well-known units for a fraction of the price. Utilizing true convection, the V-Tower is a convenient and reliable desktop vaporizer. The V-Tower uses glass components perfect for maintaining flavour and keeping clean. The digital readout allows for temperature, volume and C/F control, while the wide base keeps the device sturdy. The exterior of the unit is high grade, dual-wall, stainless steel that stays cool to the touch. However, the glass pieces get hot. Seriously.

Instructions

To use: Press power button to turn ON/OFF. Unit will beep and digital readout will appear. Toggle through precise temperatures by pressing the up and down arrows. Hit the menu button to silence unit to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit, or set timer. Unit takes about a minute to heat up fully. Remember the element is wrapped in glass, so it will get HOT. It is recommended for first time use to let unit burn off excess materials for roughly 5 minutes before using. Optimal temperature is based on moisture content of your herb, amount being used, whether it’s fine or coarsely ground, how discreet you’re trying to be and of course the type of hit you enjoy. Somewhere between 180-220⁰C is a great place to stay within, remember it’s always easier to add heat than to remove it. While you’re waiting for your unit to heat start packing your bowl, and once heating is completed connect bowl with glass surrounding heating element. After bowl is placed on device ONLY touch the black rim (this black rim should be at the top) – the rest of the glass will be TOO HOT. I cannot stress this enough, you WILL burn your fingers. After the bowl is in place add glass whip. Draw slowly to achieve proper hits. Adding heat as your session increases is a great way to utilize all your herb has to offer. When herb is finished it will lose it’s flavour and will be a dark brown colour, however it will still be the same consistency as when you put it in. Save your vaporized material for making edibles. Vaporizing has “decarboxylated” the herb for you – you’re ready to bake!

Randy's Chill Vaporizer

CV5008BK

Log in for pricing

Randy’s Chill is made from lightweight aluminum and is the only vaporizer that has a freezable tube. It works similar to a water pipe’s ice catcher without the mess. It offers exceptional flavour that’s easy to achieve with the chilled tube. Freeze the tube upright in the freezer for at least 15 minutes before use.

The Chill is a 2-in-1 vaporizer, which allows you to use dry herb and extracts. The dry herb attachment is a ceramic plate with a quartz cup and has 3 temperature settings. The three settings are low, medium and high and are colour coded as follows, Red: 212-392⁰F (100-200⁰C), Green: 450-572⁰F (232-300⁰C) and White: 600-752⁰F (315-400⁰C). The concentrate attachment is a dual quartz coil with a quartz cup and has 3 temperature settings. The three settings are low, medium and high and are colour coded as follows, Red: 315-450⁰F (157-232⁰C), Green: 450-600⁰F (232-315⁰C), and White: 600-900⁰F (315-482⁰F).

Swapping between the coils is a breeze with the magnetic coil chamber. The bottom of the Chill acts as a storage compartment and can fit an extra coil and the included metal tool. Randy’s Chill also comes equipped with an aqua bubbler, that provides portable water filtration. The aqua bubbler mouthpiece is especially handy when you don’t have access to a freezer to chill your regular mouthpiece.

To use the device: Click the button 5 times to turn the unit ON/OFF. Press the button quickly 3 times to toggle between temperatures. Hold the button down to draw on the Chill. The device shuts off after 1 minute of inactivity. The Micro USB charger allows for the unit to be charged easily and efficiently.
